A very important experiment improved scientists’ understanding of the structure of matter.
The experiment involved a-particles being fired at a thin gold foil.

What happened?

A Allthe a-particles were absorbed by the nuclei of the gold atoms.

B_ All the a-particles were unaffected by the gold atoms.

C Some of the a-particles were attracted by the neutrons in the nuclei of the gold atoms.

D Some of the a-particles were repelled by the protons in the nuclei of the gold atoms.
